pkgmetadata.longdescription: # coveo-itertoolsAnother spin on iteration goodness.## dict lookupA one-liner function to retrieve a value from a dictionary:```pythonfrom typing import Dict, Anyfrom coveo_itertools.lookups import dict_lookupexample: Dict[str, Any] = {'nested': {'key': {'lookup': True}}}assert dict_lookup(example, 'nested', 'key', 'lookup') == Trueassert dict_lookup(example, 'not', 'there', default=None) is None```
